EmailTemplate.name: Ventures Contract Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Contract with {!Opportunity.Name} is about to expire at {!Ven_Vertrag_SevenVentures__c.Ven_Contract_End__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Investment Manager,
your contract with {!Opportunity.Name} is about to expire at {!Ven_Vertrag_SevenVentures__c.Ven_Contract_End__c}.
Please contact your client immediately.
The following link leads you to the corresponding contract terms: {!Ven_Vertrag_SevenVentures__c.Link}
Best regards
